data.eml:eml: Two new species of Willowsia from New Caledonia (Collembola: Entomobryidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Feng, Bedos, Anne, Deharveng, Louis (2014): Two new species of Willowsia from New Caledonia (Collembola: Entomobryidae). Zootaxa 3872 (4): 381-386, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3872.4.5
